meanings.sent1: The kitten mewls when it wants attention.
meanings.sent2: The baby mewls softly in her sleep.
meanings.sent3: The puppy mewls playfully as it chases its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind mewls through the trees on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The lost child's mewls echoed through the empty street.

meanings.sent1: The mewls of the kittens filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The eerie mewls in the dark forest sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent3: The mewls of the baby raccoon sounded like tiny trumpets.
meanings.sent4: The mewls of the wind seemed to mourn the passing of summer.
meanings.sent5: The mewls of the newborn echoed in the quiet hospital room.
